DOC.detailed_description: There body evidence evaluate effect Weight Watchers , commercially available weight loss program , change body weight . The current investigation aim add body evidence provide additional data change body weight enhance current evidence-base regard evaluate health-related outcome . There evidence demonstrate whether weight loss result Weight Watchers program elicits change health-related outcome relate aerobic capacity , flexibility , functional fitness , sleep , psychological measure . Additionally , within scientific research protocol , measure adherence satisfaction evaluate . This study evaluate outcome beyond weight change achieve across 24-week program .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 . Set `` soft quota '' number male female participant The desire 90 % female / 10 % male split . With without previous Weight Watchers experience . Set quota number participant previous Weight Watchers experience 65 % . Self report height/weight result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 27 43 kg/m2 ( rescreen facility ) . Self report he/she feel need lose weight . Willing discontinue current overthecounter ( OTC ) supplement recommended/prescribed physician , exception multivitamin vitamin supplement . Willing follow recommendation require study protocol . Willing include demographic information ( e.g. , ethnicity , income education ) . Willing participate consumer survey focus group part intervention . Use personal smartphone daily basis . For Android device , must version 4.4 ( code : KitKat ) 5.0 ( codename : Lollipop ) . For iPhones , must iOS6 . Can accommodate Blackberry device . The willingness ability navigate use application smartphone daily basis ( minimum training provide ) . Reliable home WiFi access Ability commit attend 27 study visit approximately 26 week : Ability commit ( best ability ) attend weekly meeting , 3060 minute duration , day time week 24 consecutive week ( daytime evening option available ) . Ability commit 3 additional study visit Weeks 0 , 12 , 24 , approximately 90 minute duration , complete assessment ( height , weight , questionnaire , physical measure ) .
